ai-patthana17.16:0.2_0: (This should be expanded as in the teachings.)
ai-patthana17.16:0.3_0: should prepare a meal to satisfy.
ai-patthana17.16:1.1_0: skilled in the teaching, not skilled in terminology, and skilled in sequence.
ai-patthana17.16:2.1_0: (The eighteen bases for knowing that the basis of psychic power don’t arise in the previous set.)
